entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
